recipe.title: Tangy Coleslaw
ingredients: 1 2 1/2-pound green cabbage, quartered, cored, very thinly sliced
instructions: Whisk 1 cup mayonnaise and 1/2 cup barbecue sauce in large bowl to blend. Mix in sliced cabbage. Season slaw to taste with salt and pepper. Refrigerate 3 to 8 hours, tossing occasionally.
